channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Question:
I join my server by logging in with: Server IP: 0.0.0.0 Port: 5555
I can logon but noone else can. I have read the probably about every guide on here. I have forwarded ALL my ports correctly. Disabled Firewalls. Disabled Anti-virus.
I am using pimpscape source (is there another one I should try?)
1. I run the compiler.bat 2. I run runserver.bat 3. I login on my server 4. Noone else can log on
Posted on: December 15, 2007, 09:35:47 PMOk, I have a video of my problem, download my video from:
http://rapidshare.com/files/76860847/clip0002.avi
Watch it on full screen so none of the text displays weird.
Then post what my problem could be.
Thanks....
NOTE: You can also watch it on youtube at:
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=nDTMP-ZeHzM

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @vthokie4me vthokie4me
item.description:
@vthokie4me wrote:

Question:

I join my server by logging in with:
Server IP: 0.0.0.0
Port: 5555

I can logon but noone else can. I have read the probably about every guide on here. I have forwarded ALL my ports correctly. Disabled Firewalls. Disabled Anti-virus.

I am using pimpscape source (is there another one I should try?)

  1. I run the compiler.bat
  2. I run runserver.bat
  3. I login on my server
  4. Noone else can log on

Posted on: December 15, 2007, 09:35:47 PMOk, I have a video of my problem, download my video from:

http://rapidshare.com/files/76860847/clip0002.avi

Watch it on full screen so none of the text displays weird.

Then post what my problem could be.

Thanksâ€¦
